details: happy anniversary, my love! a year of you driving me insane
i dont even know where to begin
words will never be enough for what we have
we ve been through so much
things that could have broken us
things that did break us for a while
but we never let go
even when it hurt
even when we didnt understand each other
even when the world felt too heavy
we held on
youve seen me at my worst, at my weakest
yet, you stayed. you chose me. you always do
do you know how much that means to me?
how much YOU mean to me?
lets go back to our first dateâ€¦
9th march 2024
lemme show you the fav picture i clicked
the way my face has the biggest smile at the background, proves everything
trying to act normal but failing miserably
the way my heart was racing
i still remember how nervous yet excited i was
how every little moment felt like a dream
the way you looked at me
the way we laughed
the way time seemed to slip away too fast
if i could, i would go back
and relive it a million times
just to feel that first spark all over again
but the best part?
every day with you still feels just as special
now lets see the most precious day for me!! your birthday
cause our first kiss!!!!
and the first time you insisted to take selfie
ahh look at my hot boyfie
the way my heart pounded so loudly i thought you'd hear it
every day spent with you, makes me miss you even more
i love this picture sm
thank youu for making the most memorable birthday
lets see our first spent valentines
damn i look sooo pretty here.
promise me youll look at me like this whole life -,-
soo many memories we ve created in a year
maybe this year you will finally learn how to read my mind
now promise me you ll always choose me
even on the days i m difficult to love
promise me youll never give up on us
even on the days when it feels easier to walk away
promise me you wont let anyone come between what we have
promise me that in every lifetime, youll find me and love me again
yayyy, im so happy
you will always be my first love
all the promises we have made to us
we will fulfill them one by one
i love you!
may Allah bless our bonding
